lodash.isstring v4.0.1
Installation

lodash.isstring v4.0.1

The lodash method _.isString exported as a Node.js module.

Installation

Using npm:

$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.isstring

In Node.js:

var isString = require('lodash.isstring');

See the documentation or package source for more details.
